Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max
Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question [1].
The type of max(17, -12) is

Question [2].
The type of max(-3, 11.03034698032448800) is

Question [3]. 
max(13, 4) ==

Question [4]. 
max(-11, ) == -10

Question [5]. 
max(6.51392244134865200, ) == 6.51392244134865200
